notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: N.N. conducted in vitro and in vivo experimental work, and data collection, literature search and manuscript preparation. M.N. conducted identification of plant. F.U., R.U., S.U., and S.A.A. helps in statistical analysis. H.M.M., A.B., and A.A. helps in formal analysis. Finally, N.N. and M.Z. refined the manuscript for publication. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
